outOfPalace.name: Out of Palace
outOfPalace.detail: The road to the Palace. Some ministers gather here to exchange their ideas

minister1.name: Minister1:
minister1.detail: "Since Dong Zhuo seized the power, he already killed several people who opposed to him."

minister2.name: Minister2:
minister2.detail: "I have a bad feeling that Dong Zhuo will announce something terrible."

executionStand.name: Execution stand
executionStand.detail: Dong Zhuo use it to kill people who opposed to him.
